China's consumer prices fall 0.8% y/y, factory deflation persistsChina's consumer prices extended their decline for a fourth month in January while producer prices also dropped, underscoring deflationary risks facing the world's second-biggest economy as it struggles to mount a solid recovery. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:43:13 GMT KVJIQM6BLNMJ3EBQBDXRGQGCJE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-consumer-price-fall-08-yy-factory-deflation-persists-2024-02-08/Reuters世界中国
China says Messi's absence in Hong Kong match beyond 'realm of sports' as fury buildsChinese state media, Hong Kong politicians and fans swiftly condemned Argentine player Lionel Messi's participation in a Japan match on Wednesday after staying on the bench just days earlier in a highly anticipated match in Hong Kong. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:22:10 GMT PWGI77D5TNO77ETSXYVRII6PY4 https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/china-says-messis-absence-hong-kong-match-beyond-realm-sports-fury-builds-2024-02-08/Reuters运动的足球
Guatemala's foreign ministry reaffirms ties with TaiwanGuatemala on Wednesday said it reaffirmed its ties with Taiwan, days after its foreign minister told Reuters the government would seek official trade ties with China while maintaining relations with Taiwan, which China claims as a province. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:20:54 GMT ZDCVOJV7PVMYJAIUJCFMVNG2OQ https://www.reuters.com/world/guatemalas-foreign-ministry-reaffirms-ties-with-taiwan-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
For China's new globetrotters, group tours are out and Northern Lights are inYuwei Zhangzou represents a new type of Chinese tourist. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:11:01 GMT XUVSGOSC4VMAVLX5M5B3XAT2BA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-new-globetrotters-group-tours-are-out-northern-lights-are-2024-02-08/Casey Hall, Sophie Yu世界中国
PNG leader Marape tells Australia economic growth brings securityPapua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape told Australia's parliament on Thursday his nation's economic growth would make Australia more secure, adding nothing would come between the two neighbours. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 00:39:08 GMT CV7DNKSGK5L5LEPP7P7MTWLUUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/png-leader-marape-tells-australia-economic-growth-brings-security-2024-02-08/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Dollar oscillates on less dovish Fed comments; China inflation data awaitedThe U.S. dollar was trading in a tight range on Thursday as traders digested less dovish remarks from policymakers overnight and looked ahead to fresh economic data from the United States. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 00:31:09 GMT JIJB33SESBICDJOIDP45NWT5ZM https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-oscillates-less-dovish-fed-comments-china-inflation-data-awaited-2024-02-08/Brigid Riley市场货币
